doc.title: 15 Ugly Sisters
doc.plot: Love, attraction and raw physical passion are explored in this poetic film involving two sisters who live in a remote country village, Amelia and Lai, and a man - an old lover, Slu - who enters their lives for a week. A lot can happen in seven days. Passions and tempers rise and fall, flare and die, and when the time is up one of them is dead.
